work.summary: Build mobile applications for Android OS.

projects.name: Coca-Cola Happy Shopmate Android App
projects.description: A reward system mobile application for Android OS. This application has bunch of features which includes Coupons, NFC, Qrcode and Beacon detection which allow users to redeem and win instant prizes.
